subject: Soccer
Fashion and Apparel
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Managers in the upper echelons of soccer tend to be an unstylish bunch, with wardrobes that speak less of Savile Row than of the bargain rack on the Island of Misfit Clothes.
snippet: Managers in the upper echelons of soccer tend to be an unstylish bunch, with wardrobes that speak less of Savile Row than of the bargain rack on the Island of Misfit Clothes.
